Uses of Interface
edu.internet2.middleware.grouperClientExt.org.apache.commons.jexl2.JexlContext

  • Packages that use JexlContext 
    Package Description
    edu.internet2.middleware.grouperClientExt.org.apache.commons.jexl2
    Provides a framework for evaluating JEXL expressions.

    • Uses of JexlContext in edu.internet2.middleware.grouperClientExt.org.apache.commons.jexl2
